title: Fragment, 17th century
medium:
Medium: silk and metallic thread
Technique: supplementary warp forming cut and uncut pile in a plain weave foundation (velvet)
creditline: Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt
description: Stylized leaf forms turning alternately left and right in horizontal rows with small quatrefoil form between them. Pattern in purple cut and uncut pile on tan ground shot through with metal strips.

tombstone.epitaph:
Fragment, 17th century.
17th century. Medium: silk and metallic thread
Technique: supplementary warp forming cut and uncut pile in a plain weave foundation (velvet). Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt. 1896-1-74.
